short_description_localized.en: With chic Italian style, our 42-square-meter/452-square-foot Executive luxury rooms have a king-size bed and are thoughtfully designed to create a spacious sanctuary.
short_description_localized.fr: Affichant un style italien chic, nos chambres de luxe Executive de 42 mètres carrés ont été soigneusement conçues pour créer un sanctuaire spacieux pour vos vacances à New York.
short_description_localized.it: Con un elegante stile italiano, le nostre lussuose camere Executive di 42 metri quadrati sono progettate per creare un ampio santuario per le vostre vacanze a New York.

description_localized.en: With chic Italian style, our 42-square-meter/452-square-foot Executive luxury rooms are thoughtfully designed to create a spacious sanctuary for your vacation in NYC. There’s a king size bed, comfortable armchairs and an Italian marble bathroom, all complemented by Empire-style cherry wood furniture and elegant furnishings. The best you can find in Manhattan.
description_localized.fr: Affichant un style italien chic, nos chambres de luxe Executive de 42 mètres carrés ont été soigneusement conçues pour créer un sanctuaire spacieux pour vos vacances à New York. Il y a un lit king size, des fauteuils confortables et une salle de bain en marbre italien, tous complétés par un mobilier en bois de cerisier de style Empire et un mobilier élégant. Le meilleur que vous pouvez trouver à Manhattan. Max 2 invités.
description_localized.it: Con un elegante stile italiano, le nostre lussuose camere Executive di 42 metri quadrati sono progettate per creare un ampio santuario per le vostre vacanze a New York. C'è un letto king size, comode poltrone e un bagno in marmo italiano, il tutto completato da mobili in legno di ciliegio in stile impero e mobili eleganti. Il meglio che puoi trovare a Manhattan. Max 2 ospiti.

images.name: Executive-Room-
images.alt: This photo showcases our 450 square foot room, featuring one King size bed against the side wall with two night stands on each side. Across from the bed there is an armoire with dresser drawers and a 43 inch flat screen TV. Next to the armoire you will find a fully stocked mini bar, including wine, bottled beverages and assorted snacks available for purchase. Located near the window there is a comfortable armchair with an additional side table next to it.  The room also features a full size work desk, an Italian marble bathroom with a 55 gallon soaking tub and a vanity.
